request.description:
This is the REST API version of getting a response from OpenAI.  
It uses the same logic as WebSocket to get the response, but it doesnâ€™t store any chat data in MongoDB.  
Since I have scraped only one movie script, only the movie _The Social Network_ is available. However, you can try any character from that movie. You can find the available characters below.

This api is to get chat history of a particular user

Replace id in params to change user
